p: Song etÂ al. [32] have proposed a deep learning model for studying CT (Computer Tomography) images of COVID-19 patients. They collected lung CT images from COVID-19 patients, bacterial pneumonia patients, and healthy people from two hospitals in China. Their proposed framework DeepPneumonia has an AUC (Area Under Curve) metric of 0.99 and sensitivity of 0.93 with regard to distinction of COVID-19 from other diseases.
